name: Through This Winter
description:
You have done a bad thing! It’s not clear what, but it was really bad. Bad enough to isolate you from your friends, you think. This presents a good opportunity to step back and introspect — work on yourself a little. And who better to help you with your self-reimagining than a few of your old memories. These memories, manifested as personalities, will help you realign yourself so that, once winter is over and spring presents itself, you can reconnect with your friends as someone more… deserving. In the meantime, stay holed up in your apartment, yeah?

CW: gaslighting. disturbing imagery, suicide
